item.description: AGU2022 üåé Our preliminary work on studying the impacts of climate extremes, particularly droughts, on the increased frequency will be presented as a poster at the session: H32N - Causal Inference in Hydrology: Inter-comparisons, Applications, and Future Avenues at 9:00 AM - 12:30 PM on Wednesday, December 14. Welcome to stop by and discuss with me. If you are interested in this research and have any further questions or comments, please also feel free to contact me.
